about_the_game:
Hollow Memories is daily life simulation game. You recently moved back to your hometown to find a job. After moving into a suspiciously cheap apartment, you find out that it's haunted by a pair of sexy ghosts, and you're stuck with them until the curse is broken. With the help of a small spirit, discover a way to break the curse, and help the ghosts move on by filling their hollow memories.

FEATURES

  • Living with 2 sexy ghosts!

  • Uncover an intriguing plot about family!

  • Hand drawn, frame by frame animated scenes!

GAMEPLAY

  • Explore the house!

  • Uncover memories by playing the minigame!

  • Sexy interactions with the ladies!

  • Upgrade your spirit to last longer and unlock more scenes!

  • Try not to die!
